quest.name: Tipping the Scale
journal: Zeynuha has a sack of giantsgall for you.
objectives: Deliver the sack of giantsgall to Nidhana.
Speak with the Radiant Host soldier.

dialogue.name: ZEYNUHA
dialogue.text: Here you are─a sack of the purest giantsgall. We always set some aside for our alchemist friends.

dialogue.name: ZEYNUHA
dialogue.text: When you deliver it, let the good folk of the Great Work know that we're grateful for their efforts. If they need more, they need but ask.

dialogue.name: ZEYNUHA
dialogue.text: Payment? You needn't worry─the satrap will see us compensated. But even if he did not, we wouldn't hesitate to provide what we can. We're in this fight together, after all.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome back, Forename. Dare I hope you have the giantsgall?

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Oh my, such fine specimens! Thank you so much for bringing these!

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: We now have everything we need to make our next prototype─one that should be capable of passing our most rigorous tests.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: When it is ready, it will be time for the true test, so please take your ease while you can!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Nothing unusual so far. Don't worry about us─think only of your own task.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The warding scale doth promise to alter the course of conflict. Yet even as it giveth us cause to rejoice, we must needs brace ourselves for the Telophoroi's response.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: What of that boy... Varshahn, was it?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text:
Running this and that errand for the satrap, you say...
...Hm? Why do I ask? 'Tis nothing. Curiosity.

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOST04375
dialogue.text: The satrap has granted you the use of this boat. May it serve you well!

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: This is a rather finer boat than I had expected, but I won't complain.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: All that remains is to board and be on our way. Oh, and if I should become corrupted, do not stay your hand. Of course I pray it does not come to that, but you must protect yourself.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Other alchemists can fulfill my role, but you and your blessing are one of a kind...and perhaps our only hope for toppling this tower. For all our sakes, do not hesitate to do what must be done. Whatever that may be.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: ...Well, the longer I draw this out, the more nervous I become. Let's be off!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Head to the Tower of Zot with Nidhana?

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOST04375
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned! But...where is Mistress Nidhana?

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOST04375
dialogue.text: Manusya preserve... Just when we had succeeded in making the talisman...

dialogue.name: RADIANTHOST04375
dialogue.text: I-I must report this at once! Meanwhile, please return to the Great Work!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thy demeanor bespeaketh consternation, Forename...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Hm... Bad tidings, I take it.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...Something's gone awry, hasn't it? What happened?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: So it was Fandaniel after all... Damn that bastard!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I'm sure you wanted to do more...but you were right to return here first.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: We must tread warily lest we endanger Nidhana and the other captives.
